_header: Criste qui lux es et dies
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 309.

Banna.First Lines:
Christe qui lux es et diesO Iesu chryst the verry
                    licht…
Banna.Last Lines:
…That we thyne Endles Ioy may seIn sempiterna
                    secula
